uoled_library Documentation

uOLED - Library to communicate and control micro-OLED 4D Displays. Created by Juan Manuel Castro R. (October 2009) Released into the public domain. Extended with some help from Jeroen alias Yot at arduino forum.

Whan can you do with this library.

What?

Compatible hardware.

Some brabble on wich hardware is compatible with this library.

How to connect the wires.

Supply voltage, ground, Tx, Rx. Optional sound output and/or button input.
